src:
Šok terapija dala rezultat: Prva pobeda Igokee
03 Nov 2019, 23:09 by Zile
Igokea – Zadar 79:71 (23:12, 13:23, 20:18, 23:18)
Smena trenera imala je efekta u Igokei – klub iz Laktaša je došao do svoje prve pobede u ABA ligi ove sezone.
Igokea je u 5. kolu pod vođstvom povratnika na klupu, Dragana Bajića, ugostila Zadar koji je posle ovog meča ostao jedini tim bez pobede u regionalnom takmičenju.
Gosti su bili u zaostatku tokom čitavom prvog poluvremena, sa izuzetkom početnog vođstva od 2:0, ali su sredinom treće četvrtine prikazali svoju najbolju igru i poveli sa 46:41. Sve do 32. minuta bilo je neizvesno, Ive Ivanov je pogodio trojku za smanjenje vođstva Igokee na 60:58, ali je domaćin reagovao serijom od 7:0 i prelomio meč u svoju korist.
Igokea je do trijumfa stigla timski, imala je čak 11 asistencija više od Zadra, a ukupno 22, ali je ponovo blistao Kinan Evans sa 17 poena. Kariniauskas je ubacio 13, Lešić 12, a Ilić i Tomas su postigli po 11 poena. Kod Zadra najbolji je bio Alen sa 24 poena.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Shock therapy gives result: Igokee's first win
03 Nov 2019, 22:09 by Zile
Igokea - Zadar 79:71 (23:12, 13:23, 20:18, 23:18)
The change of coach had an effect in Igokea - the Laktaši club came to their first victory in the ABA league this season.
Igokea hosted Zadar in the 5th round under the guidance of returning punter Dragan Bajic, who after this match remained the only team without a win in the regional competition.
The visitors were left behind throughout the first half with the exception of a 2-0 lead, but in the middle of the third quarter they showed their best game and led with 46:41. Until the 32nd minute was uncertain, Ive Ivanov hit a three-pointer to reduce Igokea's lead to 60:58, but the home side responded with a 7-0 run and flipped the match to their advantage.
Igokea reached the team in triumph, having 11 assists more than Zadar, and a total of 22, but again flashed Kinan Evans with 17 points. Kariniauskas scored 13, Lesic 12, and Ilic and Tomas each scored 11 points. In Zadar, the best was Allen with 24 points.
